data.text: Mma wʼani mmere amumɔyɛfo,
Efisɛ wɔn koma dwene atirimɔdensɛm ho,
Wɔde nyansa na esi fi,
ɛnam nimdeɛ so na wonya ademude a ɛho yɛ na
Onyansafo wɔ tumi a ɛso,
nea ɔretu sa hia akwankyerɛ,
Nyansa wɔ soro dodo ma ɔkwasea;
Onipa a ɔbɔ pɔw bɔne no,
Ogyimifo nhyehyɛe yɛ bɔne,
Sɛ wʼaba mu gow wɔ ɔhaw mu a,
Gye wɔn a wɔde wɔn rekɔ akokum wɔn no nkwa;
Sɛ woka se, “Na yennim eyi ho hwee a,”
Me ba, di ɛwo, efisɛ eye;
Hu nso sɛ nyansa yɛ wo kra dɛ;
Nkɔtɛw ɔtreneeni fi sɛ ɔkwanmukafo,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ ɔtreneeni hwe ase mpɛn ason de, nanso ɔsɔre bio,
Sɛ wo tamfo hwe ase a mma ɛnyɛ wo dɛ;
efisɛ Awurade behu wʼadwene na ɔrempɛ
Nhaw wo ho wɔ abɔnefo nti,
efisɛ, ɔbɔnefo nni anidaso biara daakye,
Me ba, suro Awurade ne ɔhene,
efisɛ saa baanu yi de, ɔsɛe bɛba wɔn so mpofirim;
Eyinom nso yɛ anyansafo Nsɛnka:
Obiara a ɔbɛka akyerɛ nea odi fɔ se, “Wo ho nni asɛm” no,
Na wɔn a wobu afɔdifo fɔ no, ebesi wɔn yiye,
Mmuae pa
Wie wo mfikyidwuma
Nni adanse ntia ɔyɔnko a ɔnyɛɛ wo hwee,
Nka se, “Nea wayɛ me no me nso mɛyɛ no bi;
Menantew faa onihawfo afuw ho,
nsɔe afuw wɔ baabiara,
Mede me koma kɔɔ nea mihuu no so
nna kakra, nkotɔ kakra,
bɛma ohia aba wo so sɛ ɔkwanmukafo,
